synopsis.text: Cadis Etrama Di Raizel, or Rai, awakens after a staggering 820-year slumber to find the world drastically transformed. To acclimate to this unfamiliar era, he enrolls at Ye-Ran High School under the watchful eye of his loyal servant, Frankenstein, who also happens to be the school's principal. As Rai navigates the complexities of modern life alongside his newfound friends, he must also contend with the Union, a formidable secret organization bent on world domination. As the Noblesse, a pure-blooded aristocrat and protector of all other nobles, Rai is forced to harness his immense power to safeguard those around him from the Union's relentless onslaught. As the secrets behind his lengthy slumber begin to unravel, Rai's life as a Noblesse takes center stage in this thrilling adventure that blends the ordinary with the extraordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
